original: 同鄉陳震謂「腹中有鱗甲」暗示心術不正。後苟利其身、無心北伐，督糧不濟、欺上瞞下，貶庶民。
text: Chen Zhen from his hometown said that "there are scales in the abdomen", suggesting that the heart is not right. Later Gou benefited his body, had no intention of expedition to the north, supervised the lack of food, deceived the top and concealed the bottom, and demoted the common people.
